name: TwinShooter
description:
This is just a small game i made
fun fact i needed to learn how to make a clock for my other game
found the video to make this game and was like might as well just do the entire thing, and well end up taking a lot longer than i thought XD
here are the videos i used to learn if you are curious 

How to Make a Twin Stick Shooter in Just 4 Hours - Unity Beginner Tutorial
By: Turbo Makes Games


TOP DOWN SHOOTING in Unity
By: Brackeys

SHOOTING/FOLLOW/RETREAT ENEMY AI WITH UNITY AND C# - EASY TUTORIAL
By:  Blackthornprod

all this videos helped a lot, the first one was kinda the spark
now i know some "bugs" and i want to make some changes in the future but for now this game will be shelved i have another project on the table and i still need to finish the other game XD
first the enemy bullets stop when they reach a certain point
second you can die even if you finished the level
last the enemies shoot before you can move (but you are far enough where is not really a problem)
i will fix this problems in the future but do not expect soon
other than that hope you like this small project
